settings.subtitle: Your Portable, Wire-Free and Hassle-Free Security Solution!
settings.title: Battery-Powered Security Cameras
settings.des: Battery operated security cameras are usually 100% wire-free cameras (from top to bottom). Require no other power, no cords, no wiring!So you easily move your Reolink 100% wireless battery security camera anywhere, and set it up in minutes. Keep an HD eye on your home from anywhere using your phone or computer.Wire-free outdoor security cameras from Reolink are also solar-powered ones. Connect your camera to a solar panel so it provides enough juice for day & night monitoring, with starlight or high-quality infrared night vision. Achieve peace of mind while saving your money.

settings.product_tags: Dual Lens,Person/Vehicle Detection,180° View (Horizontal),4K Ultra HD
Dual Lens,Person/Vehicle Detection,180° View (Horizontal),4K Ultra HD

settings.title: Why Pick Dual-Lens Security Cameras?
settings.description: Kawa Duo Series security cameras equipped with two lenses allow you to see a much broader world with less distortion. Reolink TrackMix Series cameras are equipped with a telephoto lens and a wide-angle lens, providing wide-angle view and close-up view synchronously on the screen. It can also automatically track and zoom in on the detected objects.
settings.tips: * Please go to the specific product page for details.

settings.ad-description: Dual-Lens With one more high-tech lens, these dual cameras either cover larger surveillance areas or offer more advanced tracking modes. Keep everything under your control.
Equipped with two lenses, these cameras provide you with a wide field of view. You can cover more areas and explore more details.
These wide angle IP cameras feature up to 8MP resolution and show you clear, crisp images and videos. You can view everything with more colors, more sharpness and more fun.
With infrared lights and powerful spotlights, these cameras show you everything in full color and keep your home and business 24/7 guarded.

settings.title: Trusted by Hundreds of Thousands of Users

settings.comment_content: When it comes to affordable outdoor wireless security, the Argus 3 Pro delivers. This security camera is plug and play, and nearly every feature is customizable—from motion detector sensitivity to image resolution. In the app, you can configure the types of alerts and alarms you want and view a live video feed.

When it comes to affordable outdoor wireless security, the Argus 3 Pro delivers. This security camera is plug and play, and nearly every feature is customizable—from motion detector sensitivity to image resolution. In the app, you can configure the types of alerts and alarms you want and view a live video feed.
